title: Quinoa salad with feta and avocado

ingredients.item: 50g essential Waitrose Greek light salad cheese, crumbled
1 x Â½ small avocado, cut into cubes
40g Waitrose seed & sun dried tomato salad topper
2 tbsp Righteous lemon & mustard seed dressing

instructions.step: Scatter the lettuce leaves over a large plate and top with the quinoa mix.
Add the cheese, avocado and salad topper. Drizzle with the dressing and serve.
